session.goal: M5: Beta Launch — diagnose Render deploy failure, fix TS error

changes.summary: Diagnosed Render deploy failure (deploying from stale `master` instead of `main`). Fixed TypeScript error in Sidebar.tsx (NavItem icon type too narrow). Opened PR #3 with fix. Generated full project scorecard dashboard.

files_modified.description: Widened NavItem icon type to accept style?: React.CSSProperties
Added session 8 history entry, added B-06 blocker for Render branch misconfiguration
Updated with session 11 state and deploy diagnosis

decisions_made.decision: Open PR #3 to main instead of master
decisions_made.rationale: main has PR #2 merged (M1-M5 code), master is stale. Render should deploy from main.

next_immediate_step.action: Change Render deploy branch from master to main
next_immediate_step.details: User must go to Render dashboard → Settings → change branch to 'main', then trigger manual deploy. After that, approve PR #3 to get TS fix onto main.

next_three_steps.details: Test MorningFlow, BrainDump, RPM wizard, email dashboard on deployed URL
Address any issues found during beta validation

blockers: B-06: Render deploys from stale master branch — user must switch to main
continuation.context_notes: Repo has both master and main branches. main is the real default with all M1-M5 code. master only has baseline + governance overlay. Render service ID: srv-d5ookjggjchc73aitsq0. NEVER use bg-opacity-* in TW4 — use slash syntax.
